tool.name: demo3D05
tool.help:
**Description**
demo3D05 synthesizes one 3D image with nuclear, cell shape, and protein channels from all object models (nucleoli, lysosomes, endosomes, mitochondria, and microtubules) with sampling method set to sample vesicular objects from Gaussians without convolution. The model was trained from the Murphy Lab 3D HeLa dataset.
-----
**Inputs**
- Seed for Pseudo-Random Number Generator - Image Compression Algorithm
-----
**Output**
- One zip file with seven TIFF (.tif) files containing the nuclear, cell shape, nucleolar, lysosomal, endosomal, mitochondrial, and microtubule channels
-----
